entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
